channel.title: Array out of bounds for dropitems crashing server
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to fix this as it keeps crashing my server. Although i don't know where to fix it i believe its got to do with the item id of a drop being outside a certain number and i need to redefine that number somewhere (just taking a stab so could be wrong).
Just added new drop 6183 (frog token to some monsters, to use with a random item chest) so not sure why thats causing it.
[img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/9759/servercrash.png[/img]
thanks
